mainContent: Here you can find the Surahs of the Quran.
fantasyText1: You will surely follow the way of those before you
description1: The belief in Allah is the highest rank, and the Prophet (s) has explained to his nation the favor of Allah upon them through this belief.
fantasyText2: Reflections on the Death of the Prophet (s)
description2: It was the wisdom of Allah that the suffering of death is a common fate for everyone.
Edition-desc: Our app offers a special E-Edition feature, containing the latest Islamic content, including articles, books, supplications, and commentaries. You can download the E-Editions and keep them for offline reading at any time. The editions are designed to be user-friendly and compatible with all devices, providing you with a modern and convenient way to access Islamic knowledge.
Surah-desc: Enjoy E-Editions of Quranic Surahs, downloadable for offline reading, designed for all devices.
ayah-desc: E-Editions of Quranic Ayahs, offline-friendly, designed for all devices.
podcast-welcome-desc: The Islamic podcast section on your site is a place where listeners can engage in enriching discussions about Islamic teachings, spirituality, and contemporary challenges faced by Muslims. It features episodes covering topics such as Quranic reflections, personal growth, and modern issues, led by experienced scholars and speakers. The content is available in multiple languages, ensuring a wide reach.
exampleEdition: e.g., en.asad or leave blank for default
leaveBlank: Leave blank to search all English editions.
